definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

sentences.english: The application needed the ability to read and write data from a back-end database.
sentences.chinese: 應用程序需要能夠從後端數據庫讀寫數據。

sentences.english: These objects represent data that needs to be removed from backend data structure.
sentences.chinese: 這些對象表示了需要從後端數據結構中刪除的數據。

sentences.english: This reduces the number of requests to the backend database.
sentences.chinese: 這會減少對後端數據庫的請求數量。

sentences.english: Therefore, you need an additional component to handle the processing of this back-end call.
sentences.chinese: 因此，您需要其他組件進行該後端調用的處理。

sentences.english: All categories on the backend database must be thoroughly split out.
sentences.chinese: 在後端數據庫中的所有類別必須徹底分裂出去。

sentences.english: Google is the back-end technology that is suddenly less visible.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌變成了後端技術，突然間變得不那麼顯要了。

sentences.english: There is no need to write the back-end, DB and event recommendation system is in place.
sentences.chinese: 有沒有必要寫後端，DB和事件推薦系統到位。

sentences.english: Fasten the convertible -top covering with the fastening screws starting from the rear bottom side of the roof frame.
sentences.chinese: 從車頂框後端底側起，用緊固螺釘緊固活頂罩。

sentences.english: Does the distribution provide ease of integration with the back-end systems?
sentences.chinese: 這個發行版能夠方便地與後端系統集成嗎？

sentences.english: The sample back-end database contains only one table with a few simple fields.
sentences.chinese: 樣例後端數據庫只包含一個表格和幾個簡單的字段。

sentences.english: User can customize the widget position from the backend or frontend by drag and drop.
sentences.chinese: 用戶可以自定義從後端或拖放前端部件的位置。

sentences.english: Eg. 1 The females have a club-shaped posterior extremity, the males a flatly spiral end.
sentences.chinese: 雌蟲有棒狀後端，雄蟲有扁平的螺旋型後端。

sentences.english: Most of the features needed for the app would be on the back-end side.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的應用程序將需要在後端方面的功能。

definition: to draw to oneself/to gather up/to collect/to fold up (an umbrella, wings etc)/to assemble (a party of persons)/to rope in (some people)
